beamer.title: Changelog
beamer.description: Announce your newest products, latest updates, bug fixes, and company news.

subProducts.title: Push Notification
subProducts.description: Reach your users wherever they are. Send notifications to your users, even if they’re not online or logged in.

subProducts.title: In-app Notification
subProducts.description: Boost updates that matter with engaging in-app notifications like popups, top bars, snippets and more.

beamer.title: NPS
beamer.description: Measure, track, and improve customer happiness with NPS.

subProducts.title: In-app surveys
subProducts.description: Send surveys in-app while your users are in your app or on your website for higher response rates.

subProducts.title: Email & link surveys
subProducts.description: Send our surveys to your users via email and link so they can answer when they’re ready.

beamer.title: Feedback
beamer.description: Hear directly from your customers, prioritize their ideas, and share continuous product updates.

subProducts.title: Roadmap
subProducts.description: Build a public or private roadmap based on real user feedback to demonstrate product velocity.

subProducts.title: Ideas
subProducts.description: Get feedback and feature requests from users, allow them to vote on favorites, and start building what they want.

userflow.title: Flows
userflow.description: Create engaging product tours, announce new features, and gather feedback via NPS and surveys to lead users to their first Aha moment.

userflow.title: Checklists
userflow.description: Foster a sense of progress and fulfillment, encourage deeper engagement with your product, and outline clear next steps for users.

userflow.title: Launchers
userflow.description: Use hotspots to highlight features, tooltips for help text, and buttons to trigger actions like starting a flow.

userflow.title: Banners
userflow.description: Announce new features within your app by placing banners either at the top or embedded within container elements.

userflow.title: Announcements
userflow.description: Alert users with a red badge on the RC icon for unread announcements. Critical updates will pop out as a speech bubble from the launcher.

userflow.title: Resource Centers
userflow.description: A help icon in your app allows users to access help flows, search your knowledge base, and contact you via email, phone, or live chat.

userflow.title: Event Trackers
userflow.description: Monitor specific events in your app with no-code event tracking. Personalize onboarding content or stream events to analytics providers for insights.

userflow.title: AI Assistant
userflow.description: Users can interact with an AI Assistant directly within the app, receiving instant replies powered by OpenAI’s GPT-4, based on your knowledge base and website.
